posts.message:
In addition, Google has partnered with the government of Egypt to localize the six Android courses that are part of this degree into Modern Standard Arabic. For the first time in Udacityâ€™s history, this doesnâ€™t just mean subtitling the videos, but actually adapting all of the coursesâ€™ content to one specific region.

Google will offer 2,000 scholarships for students in Egypt and host job fairs and sessions for students there. Thrun noted that Udacity sees Egypt as a great stepping stone to bring the course to students around the Arabic-speaking peninsula and that bringing good education â€” and the good jobs it will hopefully enable students to get â€” â€œcould reduce the number of warsâ€ in the area.
posts.caption: techcrunch.com
posts.description: At its I/O developer conference in San Francisco, Google today announced that it has partneredÂ with Udacity to launch a six-course Android development..

posts.message: Should I upgrade to the New Windows 10 ?

Learn Node.js by Building 10 Projects:

1- Simple Web Server
2- Basic Express Site (Express, Jade, and Nodemailer)
3- User Login System (Express, and MongoDB)
4- Blog Website (Express, and MongoDB)
5- Survey App (Express, and Cassandra)
6- Bookstore (Express, Mongo DB, and Paypal)
7- Social App (Express and MongoDB)
8- Event List using MEAN (MongoDB, Express, Angular.js, and Node.js) 
9- Restaurant App (Express and MySQL)
10- Collaboration App (Keystone)

They course typically sells for $199 is available for $19 at TNW Deals!

https://deals.thenextweb.com/sales/learn-nodejs-by-building-10-projects?rid=2047764
